channel.title: Man receives 30-pound brick of weed in the mail
channel.description:
DENTON, Texas – A man in Denton, Texas who was expecting a shipment of tools instead received a 30-pound brick of marijuana that police say is worth more than $10,000. Officer Ryan Grelle says the man opened the box Monday night, realized it contained drugs and contacted police. The package from the Pharr area was handled by UPS in McAllen on Jan. 6. and apparently was intended for a Dallas address. The Denton Record-Chronicle reports no such address exists in Dallas, so the package wound up 40 miles to the northwest at the similar address in Denton.
sauce: http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/odd_misdirected_marijuana wow.. i would not call the police lol.

item.title: Man receives 30-pound brick of weed in the mail
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“arraness14, post:16, topic:258154”][quote author=Bebe link=topic=340843.msg2640681#msg2640681 date=1232844128]
If 30 pounds of marijuana is only worth $10,000 then I don’t want to smoke that stuff. Probably similar to the dirt the blacks and the Mexicans smoke near here.

But If I were to get 30 pounds of it, I would just break it down and sell it by the QP and make a lot more than $10,000 from it.
[/quote]

lol quarter pound…I would chop it by the dime. Make way more money than you :D[/quote]
Have fun selling it, ha! QP is a lot better way to get rid of shit weed. Or maybe if I have the time drop weight by the oz.

Read full topic

@jme wrote:

So I’m gay because I smoke weed?

Why do you eat fast food? Why do you breathe poluted air? Why do you sit on a computer instead of exercising and being outside? Why do you drink alcohol? Why do you drink coffee? Why do you take medications when you are sick?

Why do you care?

[quote=“Mopman, post:11, topic:258154”][quote author=goatee link=topic=340843.msg2640096#msg2640096 date=1232802961]
Lmao “Omg weed! Phone the fucking police quickly!”

Who the hell would do that? You’d at least take a bit for yourself.
[/quote]

Because that’s enough weed to put you in jail for a very very fucking long time?[/quote]

If you had a lot of money and a vendetta against someone this would be a really good idea for revenge wouldn’t it? Send them 30lbs of weed and then call the cops with an anonymous tip.
